name: Animated Instrument, Symphony
description: The Animated Instrument is a gargantuan construct that resembles a collection of large musical instruments. When motionless, it blends seamlessly into its surroundings, looking like a part of a musical ensemble.
memorable: Its ability to control the battlefield through powerful musical arrangements makes it a unique and formidable opponent.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through music, affecting the actions of nearby creatures.
relations: Often found in orchestras of constructs or allied with other musical-themed creatures.
environment: Can typically be found in concert halls, magical theaters, or locations associated with music and performance.
strengths: Immunities to poison and psychic damage, along with several condition immunities, enhance its durability in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to anti-magic fields, making it susceptible to certain spells.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack with a Musical Arrangement followed by physical strikes such as the Hammer Note and ranged attacks like the Pulsating Cacophony, delivering significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: It can perform various Musical Arrangements that manipulate creatures' actions, cause fear, and control the battlefield with powerful winds.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing to see them.
skills: Its perception skill is negative, making it less aware of its surroundings despite its powerful abilities.
additional_information: Antimagic Susceptibility: incapacitated in antimagic fields.
Grand Composition: disrupts spellcasting of creatures in its space.
Legendary Resistance: can choose to succeed on failed saves three times per day.
Magic Resistance: advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Can freely occupy another creature's space, enhancing its mobility.
spellcasting: Utilizes a variety of musical abilities that have spell-like effects, including inducing fear and cursing others.
